original_text: So the apostles agreed the names of two men. One of them was Joseph. People also called him Barsabbas and sometimes people called him Justus. The other man was called Matthias.
korean_text: 그들이 두 사람을 내세우니 하나는 바사바라고도 하고 별명은 유스도라고 하는 요셉이요 하나는 맛디아라

sentences.original_text: So the apostles agreed the names of two men.
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 사도들은 두 사람의 이름을 정했습니다.

sentences.original_text: and sometimes people called him Justus.
The other man was called Matthias.
